ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: I think we all should send feedback as well as write up a bug report as to the current nerfing of our class. As for a day we do not play our Enchanter, BAH!
ygData.messageBody:
I think we all should send feedback as well as write up a bug report as to
the current nerfing of our class. As for a day we do not play our
Enchanter, BAH! Between people who dont know about the day, or ppl who just
dont care, there will be Enchanters playing period. What is most important
is Veriant hears our upset with the most recent changes, send em email,
send feedback and write up a bug report. The more people that do, the
chances are something will be done.

Another thing along the same lines, I'd like to know where Veriant is
telling us of these changes vs. just putting them in and us finding out as
we play. If anyone know's please post it.



Telan Ka`Rlaah of Rellos Zek
